overview_description.description:
Asura Technologies is driven by a single idea – to create truly hardware and platform independent analytic, data collection and management systems based on License Plate Recognition for Smart City traffic control and mobility applications, to help reaching sustainability in traffic management. 
The market analysts state that the opportunity in the global automatic number plate recognition market will be worth US$1,436.1 mn by 2023 as compared to US$477.8 mn in 2014. Between the forecast period of 2015 and 2023, this market will expand at a robust CAGR of 12.8%. This market will be led by the vehicle parking segment, which is expected to register a CAGR of 15.2% during the forecast period. 
ARU (Asura Recognition Unit) license plate recognition and traffic data collection software (existing product): licensed per server, license fee is based on volume. License volume is defined by the maximum number of imported image channels (from traffic monitoring cameras). License fee consists of two parts: (1) upfront fee, paid in lump sum, granting lifetime license, (2) update fee (10% of upfront license fee), paid yearly from 2nd year. 

The first product release was in the end of August 2017. Marketing activity started one month before release, Sales activity started also in August 2017. 
Currently Asura has signed distributor contracts with a sum of sales target for 2018: EUR 330,000

about_short_description.short_description: Asura Technologies creates analytic, data collection and management systems based on License Plate Recognition for Smart Cities.

product.name: Asura Vehicle Recognition Unit
product.description: An AI platform that provides vehicle detection, plate recognition, vehicle categorization, and other advanced features for traffic monitoring and tolling operations.

product.name: Automatic Real-time Compliance (ARC)
product.description: A modular solution for automated parking lot monitoring, combining 24/7 touchless monitoring technology with automated compliance processes.

product.name: Access Management Automation Modules
product.description: A customizable access management solution offering site configuration, searchable records, access levels, and complex alerting for property owners.

product.name: Toll Road Video Analytics
product.description: Video analytics solutions for toll road management, including vehicle data collection, cross-referencing with payment records, and rule adherence.

product.name: Quality Assurance - Human Validation
product.description: An additional service offering human validation and quality control for AI data processing in complex automations.

product.name: Complaint Management - SaaS Premium
product.description: An optional complaint management ticketing system to address specific parker issues and improve user experience.
